# CAAutoresizingMask

**Structure**

These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/autoresizingMask] property.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CAAutoresizingMask
```

## Constants

- **init(rawValue:)**
- **layerMinXMargin**: The left margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.
- **layerWidthSizable**: The receiver’s width is flexible.
- **layerMaxXMargin**: The right margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.
- **layerMinYMargin**: The bottom margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.
- **layerHeightSizable**: The receiver’s height is flexible.
- **layerMaxYMargin**: The top margin between the receiver and its superview is flexible.

## Constants

- **Action Identifiers**: These constants are the predefined action identifiers used by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/action(forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/add(_:forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/defaultAction(forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/removeAnimation(forKey:)], Layer Filters, and the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAAction] protocol method [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAAction/run(forKey:object:arguments:)].
- **CAEdgeAntialiasingMask**: This mask is used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/edgeAntialiasingMask] property.
- **Identity Transform**: Defines the identity transform matrix used by Core Animation.
- **Scaling Filters**: These constants specify the scaling filters used by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/magnificationFilter] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/minificationFilter].
- **CATransform3D**: The standard transform matrix used throughout Core Animation.
- **CALayer.DynamicRange**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
